description.value:
Barathus born from a collective of merged adults sometimes glean fragments of memories from that collective. These barathus receive a +2 racial bonus to checks to @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.rules.GMkLZsN3a7YPvA03.JournalEntryPage.VWJLbwCeu7DsunHk]{Recall Knowledge}.

This ability replaces strange anatomy.

modifiers.name: Collective Connection
modifiers.notes: Barathus born from a collective of merged adults sometimes glean fragments of memories from that collective. These barathus receive a +2 racial bonus to checks to  Recall Knowledge.
